articles.description: Khabib Nurmagomedov's manager has revealed a fight with fellow UFC legend Georges St-Pierre would 'get him up' for a return.
articles.content:
'The Eagle' stepped away from the Octagon back in October after defeating Justin Gaethje at UFC 254.
He remains headstrong in his decision, but Ali Abdelaziz told TMZ Sports that his client would li… [+1922 chars]

articles.author: Ian Doyle
articles.title: Jose Mourinho blames Liverpool for Tottenham's run of form - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur boss Jose Mourinho has pointed to Liverpool as he sounded Premier League title warning
articles.content:
Jose Mourinho admits defeat to Liverpool was the spark for Tottenham Hotspur's Premier League slump - but warned every club will suffer this season.
 Spurs were top of the table when they visited An… [+2423 chars]

articles.title: Thiago took just 17 minutes to show he can solve Liverpool's worst problem - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Thiago impressed in a short cameo for Liverpool at Newcastle giving the Reds hope he will be a game changer this season
articles.content:

articles.author: Adrian Kajumba
articles.title: Jose Mourinho hits out at 'unprofessional' Premier League for last-minute postponement - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spurs were due to host the Cottagers on Wednesday, having earned a 1-1 draw against Wolves at Molineux last Sunday. However, the game was abandoned owing to a Covid outbreak.
articles.content: Jose Mourinho has branded the late postponement of Tottenham's clash with Fulham 'unprofessional' and likened the Premier League's handling of the situation to his experience managing in kids' footba… [+3134 chars]
